page.title: 16Politics:Local & National
page.content: This area is traditionally loyal to {Conservative}party politics. The old-style Tories tended to be paternalistic, encouraging self-help in the community rather than dependence on hand-outs from the rates and they provided little to match the spending of other areas on bus passes for the old, good pupil-teacher ratios etc. The newer Tory adminstrations have cut back further on provisions and are finding their grip challenged by an alliance of{Liberal}&{Social {Democrats}whose showing in recent local elections (where education cuts were an issue) was good but not spectacular. The Tory MP who has represented the district for a long time has a comfortable majority. There is a core of{Labour}party workers and voters who also espouse nuclear disarmament.
